name: CombinRacers
description:
Submission for Kenney Jam 2019 | Theme: Unlikely Combinations

Q: How does this game relate to the theme / why did you create this monstrosity?

A: We are all familiar with the standard WASD / arrow key combinations to move and turn your car in racing games. So we, the designers at Chilling Voodoo Samurai, thought to ourselves, "What is the most worst unlikely control scheme one could think of using for a racing game?

Games.

That's right! In this game, you play as a driver of a car racing on a 3 lane racetrack. Other race cars will constantly come down on those lanes and you will need to dodge them by scoring points in the games to move left and right.

To summarize, here is a list of unlikely combinations I feel apply to this game.

  1. Racing controls and using games for controls
  2. Multi-tasking  combinations of different mini games to survive

Q: What is the goal of the game? How do you play this game?

A: Survive as long as possible! When you inevitably die, you get  a very cool high score you can brag about to your friends. Great for people, like me, who require external validation (Not bragging, but I survived 3 minute btw)

For the left mini-game use the "WASD" keys. 

For the right mini-game use the "IJKL" keys.

For the menus, use "WASD" or "IJKL" or arrow keys and SPACE or ENTER to select. (On some menus you can click the buttons)

Q: What assets did you use in this amazing game submission that is you feel you should tell all your friends to play and tell them to tell their friends to play and...

A: Glad you think so! Below is a list of all assets used and where it is used in the game.

  • Racing game - https://www.kenney.nl/assets/racing-kit
  • Golf Mini-game
    • https://www.kenney.nl/assets/nature-kit
    • https://www.kenney.nl/assets/pirate-kit
    • https://www.kenney.nl/assets/nature-pack
    • https://www.kenney.nl/assets/minigolf-pack
  • Space Mini-game - https://www.kenney.nl/assets/space-kit
  • UI
    •  https://www.kenney.nl/assets/game-icons
    • https://www.kenney.nl/assets/ui-pack
  • Others - https://www.kenney.nl/assets/particle-pack

Hope this over-the-top description brighten your day. Have fun playing! :)

Made by ye bois -
  •  https://jarrett-ang.itch.io/ 
  • https://soulbounded.itch.io/

And it all started with one drawing...
